fullText: Marisa Tomei gives a tour de force performance as Serafina, bringing both vulnerability and fierce passion to Tennessee Williams' complex character in this beautifully mounted Broadway revival.
dtliExcerpt: Marisa Tomei gives a tour de force performance as Serafina, bringing both vulnerability and fierce passion to Tennessee Williams' complex character in this beautifully mounted Broadway revival.
